meta.title: Golden Retriever Aggression: Signs & Training Tips
meta.description: Golden Retrievers are usually friendly, but aggression can occur. Learn about resource guarding, fear aggression, and how to manage it.

h1: Dealing with Aggression in Golden Retrievers
overview: While rare, aggression in Goldens often stems from resource guarding (food/toys) or fear. Early intervention is crucial to prevent escalation.

solutions.title: Consult a Professional
solutions.description: Aggression is serious. Work with a certified behaviorist immediately.

solutions.title: Trade-Up Games
solutions.description: Teach your dog that giving up an item results in a better reward (high-value treat).

solutions.title: Desensitization
solutions.description: Gradually expose your dog to triggers at a distance where they remain calm.
